SEARCH
Package org.wmn4j.notation

Class TimeSignature

java.lang.Object
org.wmn4j.notation.TimeSignature
public final class TimeSignature extends Object
Class for time signatures. Time signatures consist of the number of beats and the duration of each beat. For example, for the time signature 4/4 the number of beats is 4 and the duration of beat is equal to the duration of a quarter note.

This class is immutable.

    Represents the symbol used to mark the time signature.

  • Method Details

    • of

      public static TimeSignature of(int numerator, int denominator)
      Returns a time signature with the given numerator and denominator.
      Parameters:
      numerator - the top number of the time signature
      denominator - the bottom number of the time signature
      Returns:
      a time signature with the given numerator and denominator

    • of

      public static TimeSignature of(int beats, Duration beatDuration)
      Returns a time signature with the given numerator and beat duration.
      Parameters:
      beats - number of beats in measure
      beatDuration - the Duration of the beats
      Returns:
      a time signature with the given numerator and beat duration
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if beats is less than 1
      NullPointerException - if beatDuration is null

    • of

      public static TimeSignature of(int beats, Duration beatDuration, TimeSignature.Symbol symbol)
      Returns a time signature with the given numerator, beat duration, and symbol.
      Parameters:
      beats - number of beats in measure
      beatDuration - the Duration of the beats
      symbol - the symbol of the time signature
      Returns:
      a time signature with the given numerator, beat duration, and symbol
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if beats is less than 1
      NullPointerException - if beatDuration is null

    • getTotalDuration

      public Duration getTotalDuration()
      Get the total duration of a measure with this time signature. For example for time signature 4/4 duration is one whole note.
      Returns:
      sum of beat durations in a measure.

    • getSymbol

      public TimeSignature.Symbol getSymbol()
      Returns the symbol used for this time signature.
      Returns:
      the symbol used for this time signature
